BBK01.SUD220: New business (volumes) of German banks / Loans for other purposes to households with a floating rate or an initial rate fixation up to 1 year

General: Estimated. The volume of new business is extrapolated to form the underlying total using the Horvitz-Thompson estimator. For the purpose of these statistics, other loans are loans granted for other purposes such as business, debt consolidation, education etc. Excluding overdrafts. p = Provisional
